item.title: [40k] Bloodthirster
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Whenever Bloodthirster deals combat damage to a player, untap it. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.

Bloodthirster can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

item.title: [40k] Blood for the Blood God!
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.

Discard your hand, then draw eight cards. Blood for the Blood God! deals 8 damage to each opponent. Exile Blood for the Blood God!

item.title: [40k] Bloodcrusher of Khorne
item.description:
Creature — Demon Knight

Trample

Devastating Charge — Other creatures you control have trample.

item.title: [40k] Blight Grenade
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature.

All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Blasphemous Act
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.

Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

item.title: [40k] Bituminous Blast
item.description:
Instant

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [40k] Birth of the Imperium
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I — Create a 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature token with vigilance for each opponent you have.

II — Each opponent sacrifices a creature.

III — Draw two cards for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.

item.title: [40k] Biotransference
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you lose 1 life and create a 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature token.

item.title: [40k] Biophagus
item.description:
Creature — Human Tyranid Wizard

Genomic Enhancement — {T}: Add one mana of any color. If this mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [40k] Bile Blight
item.description:
Instant

Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Belisarius Cawl
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Human

Ultima Founding — {T}, Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Create a 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature token with vigilance.

Master of Machines — {T}, Tap X untapped creatures you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [40k] Beacon of Unrest
item.description:
Sorcery

Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

item.title: [40k] Bastion Protector
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.

item.title: [40k] Barren Moor
item.description:
Land

Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B}.

Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [40k] Atalan Jackal
item.description:
Creature — Human Tyranid Scout

Trample, haste

Skilled Outrider — Whenever Atalan Jackal deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Assault Suit
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has haste, can't attack you or planeswalkers you control, and can't be sacrificed.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, you may have that player gain control of equipped creature until end of turn. If you do, untap it.

Equip {3}

item.title: [40k] Assault Intercessor
item.description:
Creature — Astartes Warrior

First strike, menace

Chainsword — Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

item.title: [40k] Aspiring Champion
item.description:
Creature — Astartes Warrior

Menace

Ruinous Ascension — When Aspiring Champion deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library. If that creature is a Demon, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.

item.title: [40k] Ash Barrens
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [40k] Arco-Flagellant
item.description:
Creature — Human

Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)

Arco-Flagellant can't block.

Endurant — Pay 3 life: Arco-Flagellant gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [40k] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [40k] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [40k] Arcane Sanctum
item.description:
Land

Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

item.title: [40k] Anrakyr the Traveller
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Necron

Lord of the Pyrrhian Legions — Whenever Anrakyr the Traveller attacks, you may cast an artifact spell from your hand or graveyard by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

item.title: [40k] And They Shall Know No Fear
item.description:
Instant

Choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Aetherize
item.description:
Instant

Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

item.title: [40k] Acolyte Hybrid
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid Human

Heavy Rock Cutter — Whenever Acolyte Hybrid attacks, destroy up to one target artifact. If an artifact is destroyed this way, its controller draws a card.

item.title: [40k] Abundance
item.description:
Enchantment

If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [40k] Aberrant
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid Mutant

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Trample

Heavy Power Hammer — Whenever Aberrant deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

item.title: [snc] A-Speakeasy Server
item.description:
Creature — Bird Citizen

Flying

When Speakeasy Server enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

item.title: [snc] A-Celebrity Fencer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Celebrity Fencer.

item.title: [snc] A-Buy Your Silence
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [snc] A-Sewer Crocodile
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

{3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [snc] A-Public Enemy
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

All creatures attack enchanted creature's controller each combat if able.

When enchanted creature dies, draw two cards.

item.title: [snc] A-Psionic Snoop
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Flash

When Psionic Snoop enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

item.title: [snc] A-Vampire Scrivener
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Flying

Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.

Whenever you lose life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.

item.title: [snc] A-Demon's Due
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [snc] A-Case the Joint
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards, then look at the top card of each player's library.

item.title: [snc] A-Midnight Assassin
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Assassin

Flying, deathtouch

item.title: [snc] A-Graveyard Shift
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell has flash as long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [snc] A-Incriminate
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.

item.title: [snc] A-Revel Ruiner
item.description:
Creature — Cephalid Rogue

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

When Revel Ruiner enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

item.title: [snc] A-Exhibition Magician
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Exhibition Magician enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

• Create a Treasure token.

item.title: [snc] A-Deal Gone Bad
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. You gain 3 life.

item.title: [snc] A-Sizzling Soloist
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, that creature attacks during its controller's next combat phase if able.

item.title: [snc] A-Ready to Rumble
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Damage can't be prevented this turn. Ready to Rumble deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [snc] A-Pyre-Sledge Arsonist
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Shaman

{1}, {T}: Pyre-Sledge Arsonist deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Jackhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [snc] A-Warm Welcome
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.
